content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. However, discussing specific rental prices over this medium is not ideal. To proceed with this conversation, I suggest we schedule an in-person meeting where we can openly negotiate and address any questions you may have about the property and its terms. If you agree to this arrangement, please get back to me with a few convenient dates and times. In the meantime, I'll look forward to hearing from you. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
